# Balance - Financial Tracking App

## Project Overview
A Next.js application for managing income and expenses using Google Sheets as the data storage backend.

## Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- NextAuth.js for Google OAuth
- Google Sheets API
- Zustand for state management
- Recharts for data visualization
- shadcn/ui components

## Setup Completed
- [x] Next.js project initialization
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [ ] Google OAuth configuration
- [ ] UI components setup
- [ ] Google Sheets integration
- [ ] Transaction management
- [ ] Dashboard and analytics

## Development Notes
- All financial data is stored in user's Google Sheets
- No database on server - privacy-first approach
- Modern, minimalist design with sharp, clear colors
- RTL support for Hebrew interface
